title: ISketchText.IGetCoordinates
description: Gets the position of this sketch text.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of 3 double values, the x,y,z coordinate of the sketch text VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
To set the position of this sketch text, use
ISketchText::SetCoordinates
.
